comment.author: 7520518@N03
comment._content: This is my Great Grandmother, Vanice Sullivan - wife of the Drouin Station Master Joseph Sullivan

comment.author: 67193564@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/deborahlrowe] Hi Deborah.L, thanks for the info - we love knowing people's names rather than having to title photographs 'Unidentified woman'! We have updated the title of this photograph in Flickr and our catalogue: nla.gov.au/nla.cat-vn2142955
